name: Now You See Me, Now You Don't (Antonio Russo, jaquesoler)
name_original: Now You See Me, Now You Don't (Antonio Russo, jaquesoler)
description:
Now You See Me, Now You Don't

 A game made for the 2022 Global Game Jam - Duality

A game by : 

Antonio Russo (https://antoniocror.itch.io/) 

Jaques M. Soler (https://jaquesoler.itch.io/)

Install:

Just unzip the folder and double-click the executable file.

How to Play:

Try to achieve the highest score, by killing the enemies. The detective can shoot the spirits. The ghost can hit the skeletons.

To change the character press Q. To shoot with the detective, aim with the mouse and shoot with the left button. To move the characters use WASD. The ghost uses WASD to hit enemies.

Have Fun!!
